short_description: s.e. taylor & associates is an industrial air solutions company based in baltimore, maryland, united states.
long_description: taylor & associates, inc. was founded in october, 2005 by stephen taylor, who brings over 25 years of experience in the commercial and residential plumbing markets. the company's primary focus is to develop strong relationships with owners, architects and engineers, and provide them with the best products and information they would need to ensure their requirements and design standards are met. sales managers have strategically planned and organized goals for market penetration for all lines represented by s.e. these goals are achieved by a professional sales and marketing team which drives sales through the wholesale channels, coupled by forming very strong secondary market relationships. taylor & associates, inc. has developed creative plans in order to ensure that new product launches and promotions are successful. in today's competitive market we understand the value of relationships, partnerships, and integrity. gaining customer loyalty is our specialty. we are proud to represent only the highest quality manufacturers that offer many solution solving consideration for all projects with endless posibilities.
business_tags: commercial & residential | architects design | sales and marketing | architecture firms | office & staff | strategic planning | wholesale | quality & manufacturing | professional association | specification writing | web hosting
generated_description: s.e. taylor and associates, legally known as s.e. taylor & associates inc., is an independent manufacturer's representative firm based in baltimore, maryland. the company operates in washington dc, maryland, delaware, pennsylvania, virginia, and new jersey. taylor & associates specializes in providing architectural and engineering services, including specification writing, code compliance, and certified education for architects. they also offer product promotion, customer service, and technical support for distributors, as well as problem-solving, technical support, and product education for end-users. the firm is a member of various professional associations, ensuring alignment with customer demands and maintaining strong relationships within the industry.
